publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3900 Mr David Davidson: The Road User Charging (Penalty Charges) (Scotland) Regulations 2005—That the Local Government and Transport Committee recommends that nothing further be done under the Road User Charging (Penalty Charges) (Scotland) Regulations 2005 (SSI 2005/652).

S2M-3900 Mr David Davidson: The Road User Charging (Penalty Charges) (Scotland) Regulations 2005—That the Local Government and Transport Committee recommends that nothing further be done under the Road User Charging (Penalty Charges) (Scotland) Regulations 2005 (SSI 2005/652).
